string-array.name: help_text
string-array.item: Take a pic and turn it into a meme
Create a meme from an existing pic
View and share your saved memes
Swipe left or right to move between tabs once they have been opened
Swipe up to share a meme you have created
If you see a trash bin icon in the lower right, swipe down to Delete
If no trash bin is visible, swipe down to Edit
